text: hey guys it's pie from the YouTube
channel pylons kitchen and I want to
give you a little sneak peek into my new
cookbook hot pie kitchen so my goal for
this book is to get you cooking Thai
food with confidence because I know that
for many people Thai cooking can be
intimidating and mysterious but what
most people don't know is that you can
cook Thai like a native if you just
understand a few basic principles that
are the foundation of Thai cuisine and
that is what this book is all about I am
delighted to find that my cooking show
hot Thai kitchen has become the go-to
resource for Thai food lovers all over
the world and I believe this is because
I don't just teach recipes but I also
teach a deeper understanding of those
dishes and in this book I have taken
that same philosophy and broaden it to
the full scope of Thai cuisine think of
it like a handbook for Thai cooking we
explore Thai food culture we talk about
how to use different ingredients we even
dealt into lesser-known topics like dips
and desserts and we asked basic but
crucial questions like what is a Thai
curry and once you get to the recipes of
course there are the beloved classic
dishes but also you get to try some
hidden gems of Thai cuisine that you
won't easily find outside of Thailand
and I've also included some recipes with
a special place in my heart and those
are the simple home-cooked meals that I
grew up on hot Thai Kitchen fans have
been asking for this book for years and
I promise you that once you've read it
you will be cooking Thai food like a
native in no time so get yourself a copy
and let's get started
